global_style.style: Render a Modern Graphic Novel with overall style aims for a distinctive, professional look that is approachable and technically accurate, drawing inspiration from educational graphic novels. It blends modern tech aesthetics with Kenyan-influenced design elements. The characters are designed to be relatable and aspirational, with a focus on diversity and representation. The environments reflect a blend of modern tech and traditional Kenyan elements, creating a unique visual identity. The art direction emphasizes clarity and precision, ensuring that technical concepts are easily understood while maintaining an engaging narrative flow.
global_style.line_style: The recommended line style features clean, medium-weight lines with selective detail. The art direction includes semi-realistic facial expressions and body language (not overly cartoonish) and slightly stylized proportions for expressiveness. Technical elements should have a crisp, precise representation.
palette: Primary Colors: Deep Indigo Blue (#2D3E50) for reliability and the banking sector, Vibrant Orange (#E67E22) drawing from Kenyan textiles and representing innovation, and Teal (#1ABC9C) for metrics and technical elements.

Supporting Colors: Warm Gray (#95A5A6) for backgrounds, Soft White (#ECF0F1) for text backgrounds, and Accent Red (#E74C3C) for alerts and warning states. This palette balances professional credibility with vibrant elements reflecting Ava's personality and heritage.
global_style.atmosphere: Create through the environment and setting, which include modern tech environments with subtle African architectural elements, the Nairobi skyline featuring recognizable landmarks, and banking environments that mix traditional and modern tech elements.

layout_rules.speech_bubble_font: clean lettering. Do hyphenate words at the end of lines.

panels.scene_description: Ava stands before a wall-sized heat-map of pager alerts. Daniel, Emmanuel, and Jamal sit at a conference table in a modern Nairobi tech hub. Ava points a laser at a bright red square.

speech_bubbles.Ava: This red block is every payday outage—847 timeouts in a single hour!
speech_bubbles.Daniel: No wonder the pager ruins Fridays…

panels.narration: From firefighting to promises: Ava reveals the hidden cost of reactive ops.

panels.scene_description: Busy bank branch: teller Wanjiru serves customers while a mobile phone in the foreground spins on 'Processing transfer…'. Ava appears in a small inset giving guidance.

speech_bubbles.Ava: Banking users don’t care about servers—they care about this loading wheel.
speech_bubbles.Emmanuel: So our metrics must match their experience.

panels.narration: Customer-centric reliability begins with the user journey, not CPU graphs.

panels.scene_description: Close-up of a Grafana dashboard showing a green latency-ratio gauge. Ava and Daniel discuss the screen; Ava’s fingertip hovers over the 0.999 line.

speech_bubbles.Ava: This ratio is the heartbeat of fund-transfer latency.
speech_bubbles.Daniel: What if we tighten it to 200 ms?

panels.narration: Unpacking the SLI that will power every later objective.

panels.scene_description: Ava sketches a percentile curve on a whiteboard, drawing a dotted SLO line at 300 ms. Malik and Jamal observe, pens in hand.

speech_bubbles.Ava: Set the SLO just above historical p99—ambitious, not impossible.
speech_bubbles.Malik: So 300 ms becomes our public promise.

panels.narration: Drafting a measurable objective grounded in real data.

panels.scene_description: A large red-to-green dial labelled 'Error-Budget Meter' glows on a screen. Ava playfully slaps her wrist while a learner winces.

speech_bubbles.Ava: Burn 31 % of budget on day 2? Freeze deploys—now!
speech_bubbles.Learner: But marketing promised a Friday launch…

panels.narration: Error budgets turn goodwill into a quantitative safety valve.

panels.scene_description: Composite Grafana dashboard: SLI gauge, SLO sparkline, and error-budget burn-rate chart. Ava leans over a learner’s laptop.

speech_bubbles.Ava: All three widgets in one view—act before customers ever feel pain.
speech_bubbles.Learner: I can finally see trouble coming!

panels.narration: Correlating indicator, objective, and budget on a single glass pane.

panels.scene_description: GitHub pull-request page with a green 'Merged' badge showing 99.95 % compliance. Ava gives Wanjiru a thumbs-up.

speech_bubbles.Ava: Our first reliability commitment is live—nice work!

panels.narration: The team’s inaugural SLO merges, signalling a new era of accountable reliability.
